Reference

All functions

cpuInfo()

System CPU information

cpuLoad()

Current system CPU usage

cpuUser()

System CPU usage by user

cpus()

The number of system CPUs

hostname()

Current system host name

ipaddress()

Current host IP address

isAlive()

Check if a host is active

memoryAvailable()

Available system memory

memoryInfo()

System memory information

memoryTotal()

Total system memory

memoryUsed()

Used system memory

memoryUser()

System memory by user

partitions()

Disk partition information

processes()

Current system processes

uptime()

Current system uptime

whoami()

Curren system username
